tool_description: Calculates various volatility metrics including realized volatility, GARCH estimates, and implied volatility proxies from price data.

method.description: Volatility calculation method: realized, garch, ewma, parkinson

annualization_factor.description: Factor to annualize volatility (typically 252 for daily, 8760 for hourly)

error_messages: Insufficient data: Need at least 10 price points for volatility calculation.
Mismatched arrays: prices and timestamps arrays must have the same length.
Invalid method: Use one of [realized, garch, ewma, parkinson].
Window size out of range: Must be between 5 and 252.
Invalid annualization factor: Must be greater than 0.
usage: Provide prices and timestamps arrays, optionally specify method, window_size, and annualization_factor. Returns calculated volatility metrics.

volatility_percentile.description: Current volatility percentile relative to historical range

method_used.description: Volatility calculation method that was applied
